name: Handytools4astronomers
tagline: Collection of scripts Astronomers may find usefull
body:
This is a collection of Handy tools for Astronomers.
The usage instruction for each script is there in first few lines of the code.
License given at the end of this file is valid for all the scripts in this repository.
-cheers
indiajoe
